GSD.description:
ARM: OMAP2+: pdata-quirks: Fix refcount leak bug

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 75f23d72b6e0a34c8a0e8d275b69ba1e6dd0f15f. For more details please see the references link.
